verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَبِي نَصْرٍ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عُثْمَانَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا يَحْرُمُ الْعَصِيرُ حَتَّى يَغْلِيَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Abu Nasr, from Hammad Bin Usman, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The (grape) juice is not Prohibited until it boils’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَاصِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا بَأْسَ بِشُرْبِ الْعَصِيرِ سِتَّةَ أَيَّامٍ قَالَ ابْنُ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ مَعْنَاهُ مَا لَمْ يَغْلِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Muhammad Bin Aasim, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is no problem with drinking the (grape) juice of six days (old)’. Ibn Abu Umeyr (the narrator) said, ‘Its meaning is, for as long as it was not boiled’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِي يَحْيَى الْوَاسِطِيِّ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عُثْمَانَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سَأَلْتُهُ عَنْ شُرْبِ الْعَصِيرِ فَقَالَ اشْرَبْهُ مَا لَمْ يَغْلِ فَإِذَا غَلَى فَلَا تَشْرَبْهُ قَالَ قُلْتُ جُعِلْتُ فِدَاكَ أَيُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ الْغَلَيَانُ قَالَ الْقَلْبُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Abu Yahya Al Wasity, from Hammad Bin Usman, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘I asked him<sup>asws</sup> about drinking the (grape) juice, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Drink it for as long as it has not boiled. So when it is boiled, so do not drink it’. I said, ‘May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>! Which thing is the boiling?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The transformation (fermentation)’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ الْجَهْمِ عَنْ ذَرِيحٍ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ إِذَا نَشَّ الْعَصِيرُ أَوْ غَلَى حَرُمَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazzal Bin Al Jahm, from Zareeh who said, 
‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘When the (grape) juice simmer or boils, it is Prohibited’.
